description: ᎯᎠ ᏣᎳᎩ-ᏲᏁᎦ ᏗᏕᏠᏆᏍᏙᏗ Ꮎ ᎠᏂᏦᎢ ᏪᏌ ᎠᏂᏓ ᎠᎴ ᏥᏔᎦ ᎤᏍᏗ ᏣᎳᎩ ᎠᎪᎵᏰᏗ. ᏗᎧᏃᎮᏗ ᏂᎨᏒᎾ. ᏗᏕᏠᏆᏍᏙᏗᏊ. This is the Cheroke-English dictionary for The Three Kittens and Chicken Little Cherokee reader. This does not include the stories. This is only a dictionary.
subjects: Foreign Language Study, Native American Languages
title: Ꮎ ᎠᏂᏦᎢ ᏪᏌ ᎠᏂᏓ ᎠᎴ ᏥᏔᎦ ᎤᏍᏗ / ᏣᎳᎩ-ᏲᏁᎦ ᏗᏕᏠᏆᏍᏙᏗ - The Three Kittens and Chicken Little / Cherokee-English Dictionary
